author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: Apple, Amazon, AT&T, Sears, Wynn, Hasbro, Newell, Kimberly-Clark, Southwest, Alcoa - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text:
Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Monday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Up 0.7%: Shares of the iPhone maker have fallen 7% over the past three sessions amid worries that demand could slow for its high-end smartphones. —Up 1.1%: Bloomberg reported that the e-commerce giant is working […]
